# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = ""
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(text)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            lines *= "\n$word"
            current_line = ""
        else
            current_line *= " $word"
        end
    end
    return lines
end
```

# Example

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello there, this is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at the 10th character per line.")
"Hello there\nthis is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at the 10th character per line."
```
